org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils

Class FilteredFileUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker<File>
      • org.forgerock.doc.maven.utils.FilteredFileUpdater

  • public class FilteredFileUpdater
extends org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker<File>
    Update matching files in all directories, replacing the first occurrence of the string to replace with the replacement string. Files are expected to be UTF-8 encoded.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker

        org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker.CancelException

        Update files that match the filter.
        Parameters:
